CREATE_TABLE: CREATE TABLE tools (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT, description TEXT, url TEXT)
INSERT_TOOL: INSERT INTO tools (name, description, url) VALUES ($name, $description, $url)
UPDATE_TOOL: UPDATE tools SET name = $name, description = $description, url = $url WHERE id = $id

SEED_TOOLS.$description: Bun is a fast, modern, all-in-one toolkit for JavaScript.
Playwright is a framework for browser automation and testing.
Pico CSS is a minimal CSS framework for semantic HTML.
